mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (user_id, category, subject, content, pinned, draft, file_idx, reg_date) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{category,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{pinned}, #{draft}, #{file_idx}, CURDATE())
INSERT INTO file (ori_filename, new_filename, file_type) VALUES (#{ori_filename}, #{new_filename}, #{file_type})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET category = #{category}, subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, pinned = #{pinned}, draft = #{draft}, file_idx = #{file_idx}, reg_date = CURRENT_DATE WHERE post_idx = #{post_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM board WHERE post_idx = #{post_idx}
SELECT post_idx, user_id, category, subject, content, pinned, draft, reg_date, file_idx FROM board ORDER BY pinned DESC, post_idx DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE pinned = 1
SELECT post_idx, user_id, category, subject, content, pinned, draft, reg_date, file_idx FROM board WHERE post_idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendee (user_id, scd_type, type_idx) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{scd_type}, #{type_idx})
mapper.select: SELECT m.name FROM attendee a JOIN member m ON a.user_id = m.user_id WHERE a.scd_type = 'MEETING' AND a.type_idx = #{post_idx} ORDER BY m.name
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM attendee WHERE scd_type = 'MEETING' AND type_idx = #{post_idx}
